resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: id
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Used as an RDN when naming an instance of the object class.

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: userLabel
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: A user-friendly (and user assignable) name of this object

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: vnfParametersList
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Parameter set of the VNF instance(s)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: gcaList
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: List of Group Call Area (GCA) Codes  (3GPP 23.003)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: mscServerFunctionGsmCell
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: This holds a set of DNs of GsmCell

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: mscServerFunctionExternalGsmCell
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: This holds a set of DNs of ExternalGsmCell

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: mscServerFunctionCsMgwFunction
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: This holds a set of DNs of CsMgwFunction

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: nriList
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: NRI shall be part of the TMSI (3GPP 23.003)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: mscServerFunctionMscPool
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: This holds a set of DNs of MscPool

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: defaultMsc
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Whether this MSC-Server is default CN node in MscPool or not (3GPP 23.236)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: iucsLink
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Iu-cs interface link connecting MSCserver to RNC, BSC and HNB GW (3GPP 23.002)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: aLink
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: A interface link connecting an MSC to GERAN (3GPP 23.002)
